titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Omite Tech.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/7/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Sulfurous acid, 2[4(1,1-dimethyl-ethyl)phenoxy]cyclohexyl-2-propynylester (CA) (Omite Tech).
